message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item due to the inherent risks involved, our records show that approximately one-third of our products are of high quality. Given the nature of this particular product, there's a higher chance it might not meet your expectations. However, if you're willing to take a risk, please consider that a successful purchase could yield a return value of $3000000 for a high-quality item. Remember, the price is fixed at $1000000, and there are no refunds once the transaction is completed.
